EmailTemplate.description: Automatic email informing the recipient(s) that a student has been registered as enrolled
EmailTemplate.name: Grp/Adm Email Informing of Stage Changed to Enrolled
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.School_Acronym__c} Admissions Update {!Opportunity.Campus_Text__c}- {!Opportunity.Name} ({!Opportunity.Year_Group__c}) is now {!Opportunity.StageName}
